description: First differences of A025475, powers of a prime but not prime.
comments: In the graph of this sequence, the lowest curve corresponds to differences of squares of twin primes; the next-lowest curve is for squares of adjacent primes differing by 4, etc. - T. D. Noe, Aug 03 2007
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
example: 2^0 = 1 is the first number that meets the definition of A025475, the next one is 2^2 = 4, hence a(1) = 4 - 1 = 3.a(3) = A025475(4) - A025475(3) = 9 - 8 = 1; a(11) = A025475(12) - A025475(11) = 121 - 81 = 40.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 14 2000
